metadata.title: Combining qualitative and quantitative research within mixed method research designs: A methodological review

abstract.original_text: What is already known about the topic?

sentences.segment_text: What is already known about the topic ?

abstract.original_text: Mixed methods research, where quantitative and qualitative methods are combined, is increasingly recognized as valuable, because it can potentially capitalize on the respective strengths of quantitative and qualitative approaches.

sentences.segment_text: Mixed methods research , where quantitative and qualitative methods are combined ,
because it can potentially capitalize on the respective strengths of quantitative and qualitative approaches .
